channel.title: Dual mouse
channel.description: I got 2 mice, I want to be able to use them as different mice on the screen, I have seen it somewhere, but I don't remember, I remember C code, and I remember a sh file. But I can't find it at the moment. I know it is possible, but I don't remember where it was. I have to go at the moment, Could people please do a search for me while I am gone?(church activity)

item.title: Dual mouse
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

well, so far, I have found a windows version(well, yeah that helps cuz 2 screens works on windows instead of linux(hopes to invite friends soon) cuz limited computers and 3 friends, but only 2 accessible at any given time. so Yay… i just need to download .NET Framework 2.0… I redid windows so i don’t got it anymore… but at least I found one, and it is also by Microsoft so I wont need to do any funky editing. [br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2007, 08:50:47 PM[/size][hr]sadly, it is an API, and I have to figure out how to use it in VB .NET, (installs Visual Studio 8)

Read full topic

That would be pretty interesting, I haven’t heard anything about it. Let me know what you find out.
